title: Professionalism, Ethics and Law in Healthcare
description:
This module aims to enhance the learner’s awareness surrounding accountability, liability and professionalism in clinical practice. Learners will explore ethical and legal structures in the local context and develop in-depth understanding of the role of the nurse and their professional duty of care.

This module will prepare learners to practice according to current legal and professional standards. Learners will be also be equipped with skills necessary to carry out academic writing and presentation.
department: Alice Lee Center for Nursing Studies
faculty: Yong Loo Lin Sch of Medicine
